sentences.english: But for you, every day I will dream the most beautiful apart.

But the friendship has been brilliant at times after losing ground.

sentences.english: Gold-inlaid lacquer ware is elegant and magnificent.

sentences.english: The mercy of God like unfaded cloth, although that was rinsed by adversities but still remain its bright colour.

sentences.english: Other kinds of folk dances are the sword dance and the colourful peacock dance.

sentences.english: And I should pray for the glory of a colorful sunset.
